column3: Location is good! 5 stops from Bruxelles Midi, very convenient. The breakfast is also great.
Really helpful staff, very clean room, variety of local beers in the fridge, great breakfast.
Beautiful house nice decorated with high ceilings. We enjoyed very much our stay here.

The B&B was located conveniently next to a metro stop, so we were able to be anywhere in the city within minutes. Paul, the owner, had already loaded tickets onto a metro card for us, so that we could immediately get to our sightseeing. Breakfast was simple but very tasty and we were made to feel very comfortable.
the character: elegance and authenticity with style
Very charming; decorated and furnished in keeping with the age and style of the building
column4: A bit noisy as the trams are just outside

column3: The room and the building are elegant and beautiful.
